title: Project-Based Educational Curriculum for Strengthening Practical Entrepreneurial Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of business operations or practical work experience
context.additional_context: Blended education program combining entrepreneurial theory learning with actual project implementation for current practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply core entrepreneurial competencies (idea generation, business model design, risk management) at each startup process stage to actual projects
Learners create sustainable business plans through creative problem-solving and present them via pitch decks
Learners cultivate an entrepreneurial mindset (challenge spirit, opportunity recognition) to lead organizational innovation
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
